mapper.update: UPDATE t_search_stats SET search_count = search_count + 1, avg_result_count = (avg_result_count * search_count + #{resultCount}) / (search_count + 1), last_search_time = NOW() WHERE keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.select: SELECT id, keyword, search_count, avg_result_count, last_search_time FROM t_search_stats ORDER BY search_count DESC, last_search_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT id, keyword, search_count, avg_result_count, last_search_time FROM t_search_stats WHERE last_search_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY search_count DESC
SELECT id, keyword, search_count, avg_result_count, last_search_time FROM t_search_stats WHERE avg_result_count = 0 ORDER BY search_count DESC
